pixi.extras.Ticker

type
class
metadata
:native
"PIXI.Ticker"

Constructor

new()
A Ticker class that runs an update loop that other objects listen to

Instance Variables

active : Bool

Whether or not this ticker runs

deltaTime : Float

The deltaTime

eventData : pixi.core.utils.EventData

the event data for this ticker to dispatch the tick event

lastTime : Float

The time at the last frame

speed : Float

The speed

timeElapsed : Float

The time between two frames

Instance Methods

start() : Void

Starts the ticker, automatically called by the constructor

stop() : Void

Stops the ticker

update() : Void

The update loop, fires the 'tick' event
